intro: The Alliance Française du Costa Rica has selected for you 100 places to visit in San José.
body: With the help of the Dérive app, let yourself be guided at random to restaurants to <0>dine out</0>, museums to <1>marvel at</1>, parks to <2>oxygenate</2> yourself, places of history to <3>reminisce</3> and clubs to <4>dance</4>.
